comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: This seems to only repro on Windows.  Doesn't repro on Mac which uses the libcurl library.  Might be an issue with corefx if it's giving different behavior on different OS's.

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body:
It looks like it is because the the Redirect is from HTTPS to HTTP and that is disabled `by design` dotnet/corefx#12171

```
http://finance.yahoo.com/d/quotes.csv?s=msft&f=snd1l1yr redirects to https://finance.yahoo.com/d/quotes.csv?s=msft&f=snd1l1yr
https://finance.yahoo.com/d/quotes.csv?s=msft&f=snd1l1yr redirects to http://download.finance.yahoo.com/d/quotes.csv?s=msft&f=snd1l1yr
```
